#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n, q, t, minn, maxx;
	cin>>n>>q;
	cin>>t;
	minn = t, maxx = t;
	for(int i=1; i<n; i++)
	{
		cin>>t;
		minn = min(t, minn);
		maxx = max(t, maxx);
	}
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>t;
		if(t>=minn && t<=maxx) cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
